settings.title: Alfa Laval M Gear Pump
settings.content: The Alfa Laval M Gear pump efficiently transfers low-volume, clean fluids for hygienic and industrial filling applications. Precision alignment, easy cleaning and simple maintenance make the stainless-steel M Gear a solid choice for dosing, sampling and filling machines. Easily adapted for use with OEM filling machines, this proven positive displacement pump is widely used across the food, chemical, personal care, and many other industries.

settings.title: Looking for other products or need help to select the right product?
settings.content: We cover the full range of Alfa Laval products and our experts are ready to support you in selecting the right product for your needs - so do not hesitate to reach out!
